name: Black Lotus Motel

Rob Riches is a puzzle adventure game.

description: You're home alone. Explore the rooms, find the keys, and, most of all, watch your tongue!

name: Puzzle Dazzle 3D
description: Puzzle Dazzle is a unique, addictive and breathtaking take on the classic block puzzle game formula. Immerse yourself into the world of puzzle dazzle, each level different from the last one you’ve played. The music, backgrounds and all the animations react to exactly how you play.

name: Silver Squad: Age of the Vortex
description: Humanity is on the brink of extension; take the place of Captain Edward Stalway and save the World from the forces of the Vortex. Raid enemy bases, steal alien technologies, collect artifacts and shoot robots into tiny piles of scrap.

name: My waifu guild
description: Collect the entire guild of beautiful girls and guide them through all the dangers. Hordes of opponents await you, giant bosses and naked bodies of the main characters!

name: My Cousin the Rogue
description: A simple traditional roguelike with ASCII art where you save the monsters instead of hurting them.

name: Nemesis: Race Against the Pandemic
description: Are you ready to save the world from a deadly pandemic? Nemesis: Race Against The Pandemic is an action-packed third-person shooter game where you shoot down the bad guys and save the world from a deadly outbreak.

name: Mini Moves: Among Stars
description: Mini moves in the giant universe, simplicity is what you need to achieve your goals.

name: On the Hunt
description: Become a top class hunter polish your shooting skill to perfection!

name: Dark Dragonkin
description: Every Level is like an old school RPG puzzle.Even the enemies are puzzles of how to avoid or destroy them.Control each character separately and use their unique skills to get past obstacles.You must figure out how to gather the party at the exit portal to advance.

name: Tahul
description: Tahul is a virtual reality experience based around a fictional lost world reminiscent of ancient, Moroccan culture and was created to highlight the winners of the SIGGRAPH 2020 VR Theater.

name: Survive after hell
description: A classic first-person shooter in which we have to survive among hordes of monsters and demonic creatures, eventually reaching Satan himself.

name: Eugene's Dream: The Daily Ins And Outs Of A Sane Robot In An Insane World
description: Surreal and Weird, a game designed to hate the player. Featuring branch paths and plenty of funny events to playthrough such as platforming, shooting, bowling, horror, driving, mystery solving and more

name: The Wolf's Girl
description: "The Wolf's Girl" is an intimate story that unfolds between two friends Sheen and Chloe. Chloe persuaded Sheen to go with her to the lake. Coming to the lake, Shin feels bad, he feels some changes inside himself ... Soon he will never be able to love her again ... as a sister ...

name: Purgatory Overkill
description: "Purgatory Overkill" is a VR shooter and a VR tower defense when you can build turrets and walls to help you fight endless hordes of monsters while you actively participate in the fight with loads of guns.

name: Foul Play
description: Foul Play tells the story of a young, bright-eyed detective who is determined to succeed. Her world quickly turns upside down after she is tasked with catching a sexy, mercurial assassin. In the end, she'll need to determine how pure her conscience really is. After all, justice is subjective.

name: Nova Genetics
description: Nova Genetics is open-world sci-fi zombie survival game. With focus on survivability/exploration and quick decision making. Should you try to run and live to fight another day or build outposts and fight against threat hordes.

name: Idle TD: Heroes vs Zombies
description: An endless Tower Defense game of epic heroes vs evil zombies. Unlock and upgrade countless Heroes, artifacts, and technologies to defend against the infinite zombie swarms. Strategize the most effective placement of Heroes to synergize their skills and abilities.

name: Leonardo's Island
description: Leonardo's Island is a video game for PC. Follow the story, discover the mystery of the Island and find the Treasure! It is all about sandbox, exploring, battles and trading with another players. Build your own ship and sell it to other players! Build a flying machine and go to another Island!

name: Caught in Nowhere
description: The vast world of Caught in Nowhere perfectly entwines gorgeous landscapes with haunted, terrifying locations. With an eclectic mix of destinations, players will be glued to their screens in an attempt to discover everything that the world has to offer.

name: Super Whiplash
description: An online multiplayer vehicular combat game inspired by games like Twisted Metal. Drive a toy car around in a bedroom and pepper your friends with bullets.

name: Wild Gun
description: You are the sheriff. Robbers roam the village and pillage. Your mission is to catch robbers and bounties. Fight them to protect your town.

name: Turret Defense: Bug Invasion
description: Man the turrets! Bugs are invading Earth and you're the only one left to stop them in this arcade-style endless game. Chase high scores and don't get overwhelmed in Turret Defense: Bug Invasion!

name: Spring and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Ayano the Exorcist
description: The busty exorcist in a skin-tight bodysuit challenges a tentacle dungeon!

name: Hunted: Kobayashi Tower
description: Work your way through the skyscraper to rescue your wife from terrorists in the digital adaptation of this solo card game. Manage the central row of cards, balancing when to hide and when to push your luck, collecting items and weapons, risking a fight, as you race against the clock.

name: Fishing Together
description: Are you bored at home during the epidemic? As the United Kingdom and the EU have just introduced bans on gatherings of more than 6 people, in such cases, how can we play with friends? We still need to be social however, and we need entertainments for ourselves too.

name: Dances and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Glider Sim
description: Experience the ultimate sensation of gliding through the sky! Built for real glider pilots in mind this simulator is as close to real as it gets. The sim can be played outside VR or inside VR.

name: Save Iron Globe
description: As a star pilot of the United Earth Federation, go into the Earth orbit and destroy the alien flagship to stop the invasion.

name: Wartune Reborn
description: "Wartune Reborn" epic magic TBS game was developed by 7Road Wartune Workshop. The game shows the magnificent god-devil battlefields of Cloud City with military organization, runes, sylphs awakening, skills, castles construction and wild exploration!

name: Way Walkers: University 2
description: Picking up right where you left off in part one, the city and school are still in shock from the mysterious attacks, and the question on everyone's mind is...who was behind them, and why?

name: Gun&Dun
description: You play as a gun in order to shoot down lots of enemies in order to increase your high score. Enemies of different difficulties and colors...and even a boss fight. Pick up power-ups and don't die to beat your high score and unlock new colors to customize your gun.

name: Hog Hunter 2021
description: Hog hunter is a short atmospheric game about catching hogs out in the wild, be careful though not everything in the woods is safe...

name: Yin Yang
description: It is a minimalist puzzle game in which you have to join the two opposing forces in the universe: Yin and Yang.

name: Miracle Field
description: This is an experience game

name: Sweet and Hot
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: DarkAir
description: DarkAir is a fun action-packed flying shooter racing game where you compete against other players by uploading your top scores on the Global leaderboard and completing challenges

name: Task Men
description: Rogue-like Auto-battler game, assemble a party of recruits with unique skills and traits, level them up and slay powerful monsters!

name: FIL
description: Gallivant through the Solar System in a journey of stellar proportions in FIL to save the planets from destruction!

name: The Savoury Inspector
description: A silly jaunt into the world of The Savoury Inspector! You the apprentice, the inspector your mentor. Together, embark on a journey to solve the mysterious puzzle of the unsavoury.

name: Space Sprinter VR
description: Shake the controller up and down then you will feel like you're running.

name: Omnia
description: Omnia is an 2D platform adventure game created to help the player identify their own behavior. The game allows the player to embark on the world of their subconscious by putting them in front of decisions that need to be made based on emotions.

name: GumBall Warrior
description: GumBall Warrior is a 2d shooter puzzle adventure game inspired by the Mega Man games and other tiles. Choose your own path, travel through several strange worlds, as you defeat each of the bosses on each world unlocking new powers and expanding your kingdom.

name: Final Hope: The Plot
description: Final Hope: The Plot is a turn-based Tactical RPG with a medieval theme. Create your hero and embark on the odyssey of Uthread, a young adventurer who was born predestined to change the history of his world.

name: Archery Arena
description: Archery Arena is a third person arcade based shooter with RPG leveling system. Stomp, roll, shoot and slash your way through a horde of enemies and bosses as your work to the final arena and compete for the highscore.

name: Squaxel
description: Discover, build, destroy, take a walk on flying islands ! That's only one part from all the things that the game can give you !

name: Kawaii Neko Girls
description: Kawaii Neko Gilrs — it's a relaxing anime puzzles with cute kawaii neko girls. Solve puzzles, and collect full images. Enjoy high quality artworks.

name: Tribulation
description: In Santabell City, political intrigue and shadowy organizations have become commonplace. To counter these growing threats enter Sharla, Indira, Kyra, and Liria of the newly-formed Santabell Arbiter Branch in this intricately deep turn-based JRPG.

name: Quest for Runia
description: Quest for Runia is a relaxing VR puzzle game. You have to break 3D structures by combining at least three cubes of the same color. Try to figure out the most effective way to finish each level.

name: Kid Detective
description: The Kid Detective! The Murder Mystery RPG game that asks the question,"What's so great about the truth anyway?!?"

name: Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator
description: The Taekwondo Demonstration Team Simulator brings you a new experience. You can decorate the demonstration team by configuring the cool Taekwondo movements as a show stage.

name: Blood War
description: Special forces soldier, left alone behind enemy lines. The fascists blocked his way back to their own. Drown in the blood of these blood-thirsty Nazis. Blood War is a Hardcore platformer that will allow you to help the Nazis lose their lives. Here you will hone your shooting skills to perfection.

name: Hero by Chance
description: Hero by Chance is a tactical RPG with exciting battles and hot girls. Upgrade your army with many cool unlockables, engage in striking love stories and WIN THIS WAR!

name: Baby Dragon Rancher
description: Dragons are famous for their money hoarding and wealth. If only I could use some of that for myself, but adults are too vicious to tame. Baby dragons won't be though! It's time to collect them all! Time to get rich, and maybe I can finally pay off my student loans!

name: Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzle in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving game play will help you to relax after a hard-working day.Paintings Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults and children.

name: Paladin Lias
description: Paladin Lias in the process of a hunt for bandits, awakened a special power, in order to seek the truth of this power, Lias began all sorts of adventures.

name: The Cartesian Project
description:
The Cartesian Project is a fast-paced first-person 3D platforming game that will pit you against an endless collection of procedurally generated challenges.

You control The Sentinel, a mysterious mechanical walker with unmatched agility and dexterity. You will infiltrate countless facilities and strongholds, stealing the resources you need to fuel your expeditions as you uncover your role in the conflicts surrounding the enigmatic planet of Eridani-C.

name: Double Jump
description: Control a single character with a friend or partner, seeing how in sync you can get your motions. Being in phase will be rewarded, while being clumsy will be punished. I'm sure you have nothing to worry about though if you're always on the same page!

name: Lords of the Darkreign
description: Descend into the sunless lands! A three-way civil war ravages the realm, while an enigmatic order tries to conquer all for their draconic master. Take the role of a lord leading an army, and bring triumph to your cause! Annihilate all who defy you, and stand alone beneath the swirling sky!

name: Guillotine
description: Guillotine is a multiplayer game of social deduction, with a pinch of survival. You're in a tavern in the woods, but someone is a necromorph hungry for human meat. Guillotine the necromorph, or get eaten alive.

name: 12 Locks and Keys
description: "12 Locks and Keys" is a game for the whole family, solve interesting puzzles and puzzles. You will need to solve various tasks to collect all the keys, an interesting challenge is already waiting for you!

name: Pumpkin Dog Xtreme
description: Pumpkin Dog Xtreme is a 3D platformer inspired by 3D platforming games from the 90’s. Unique Retro soundtrack, over 24 levels and a boss battles and bonus stages. The game has a large amount of different levels and large number of enemies.

name: Pray and Spray
description: Pray And Spray is an online first-person arena shooter. Grab a gun and defend yourself from the opposing team of extraterrestrials.

name: Mark One
description: Robots built by humans are retaliating. Step in to dispose rogue robots, defeat powerful foes and save the human race in this sci-fi action shooter.

name: Home Safe and Silent
description: Home Safe and Silent is a survival game with rogue-lite and tabletop board game elements. Scavenge randomly generated locations to help your colony survive. Rotate different game boards to try and gather all of the necessary supplies while using the equipment you find to fight off the dead.

name: Beauty Agent
description: The heroine Ai belongs to a secret agent organization made up of women. Recently, the organization was attacked by evil forces, and a large number of agents were kidnapped. As the core combat member of the organization, Ai went deep into the enemy base alone to rescue his companions.

name: The Edge Of
description: Coming back home after a week-long business trip, Sam can't help but sense that something isn't quite right the moment he set foot inside his house.

name: Asteroid Blasters
description: Asteroid Blasters is a non-stop action space shooter. Inspired by Asteroids, this game will see you choose between 6 different ships each with their own characteristics and utilize a variety of weapon powerups to eradicate your enemies. Play 2 players to increase your chance of survival.

name: Negligee: Opposites Attract
description: Charlotte, has been dumped by her long term girlfriend Mikka. Fortunately her sexy friend Sophie insists on taking her out to try and cheer her up. But Sophie is quite a wildcat so who knows where such a date could lead in this yuri/lesbian themed visual novel with multiple routes and endings.

name: Early Quest
description: A turn-based fantasy-style RPG game, with a completely open, multi-level world, a unique background and many secrets and legends to discover and reveal. A system of equipment and skills customized for each character in the group allows you to create infinite strategies. Many chickens inside!

name: Outer Frontier
description: Grow crops and fight giant birds, mine precious materials while avoiding sink holes. Keep your societies needs met before unrest breaks out. And finally end the war by tracking down the enemy leader.

name: Amidst the Darkness
description: Dragged, bloodied and bruised into old dilapidated worker halls, Amidst The Darkness follows the story of a sadistic entity - known informally as The Being. Trawl your way through old abandoned halls and sewers in a bid to find an escape.

name: BeatBox Runner
description: BeatBox Runner is a retro platformer with a twist: switch states to survive its unique series of traps and challenges.

name: Panda City
description: Happiness is everything! Build your lowpoly city on a small island and make your inhabitants(pandas) happy. They are asking for a lot of things. Will everybody fit on the island an can you build the perfect home for your population?

name: Twistedland VR
description: The Craziest shoot'n'kill VR park you've ever been. Today you are Good Guy in SWAT. Tomorrow you are a bad boy on the Wild West. It's easy in the Twistedland. Just take your friends, choose realm and have fun in this freaking tactical arcade VR team shooter!

name: Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 1st Semester
description: Virtually experience the playful and relentless teasing of heroine, Takagi-san, in Teasing Master Takagi-san VR: 1st Semester. With sales of the original comic series exceeding 8.2 million copies in Japan, the romantic comedy makes its debut as a VR animation.

name: Hospitality VR
description: A VR Horror Experience, not a Game! No controller input needed! After having checked into a haunted hospital, you are being confronted with its evil resident who is not too pleased about your visit.

name: MoghVR
description: Mages are as powerful as their imagination.

name: 2MD: VR Football Evolution
description: 2MD VR Football Evolution is a room-scale two-minute drill VR arcade experience where players take on the role of soulless automaton tasked with capturing victory in the final minutes of a game. Draw the plays, call the shots, and throw the ball to take down opponents before the clock runs out. Or Else.

name: Dinner Etiquette VR
description: Asynchronous VR game (Headset & Desktop): Baby vs Dad in an epic battle to teach a child dinner etiquette.

name: VR Girls' Room in Darkness
description: In 2008, a girl named Kimmy disappeared strangely. Her parents searched for her for a long time but failed to find her, so they left this sad land. Twelve years later, you found this uninhabited house during an accidental trip.

name: VR Hiroshima 1945
description: This is a sad story, a tragic moment. In the summer of 1945, atomic weapons were used for the first time in human history.

name: Bulk Dominoes VR: Kinetic Rush
description: Build and create domino chain reactions, knock them down, then push 1 button to set them back up again. It’s fun and easy! Plus you will not have to worry about accidentally knocking them down while you're building.

name: Dinosaur Hunting Patrol 3D Jurassic VR
description: Enjoy hunting dinosaurs and protect primates in a Virtual Reality game. Dangerous T-Rex, Spinosaurus, Raptor, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, Pteranodon, Stegosaurus, Dimetrodon, Paradophosaurus. With weapons and missions !

name: VRKraft
description: Explore the Three-Worlds and stop the ascend of the ancient dragon Tetrac in this action packed online VRRPG. Level up your character and play with or against other players.

name: VR Hentai Cat
description: Would you like to enjoy erotic plays with adorable catgirls in VR?

name: Cyberspace VR
description: Cyberspace VR is a Fast-Paced Tower Defense / FPS Hybrid VR Game set in a Futuristic Dystopia where humans and AI Join Forces to save what remains. Fun and Active Combats combined with Strategic RPG Progression, all while you discover our Cinematic Universe through a mesmerizing Storytelling.

name: Beach Relaxation VR
description: Escape to your own private island in virtual reality where you can relax, paint and build sandcastles.

name: High Mountain Roller Coaster VR
description: Embark on a daring journey and discover the remains of a long-forgotten civilization nestled on top of the High Mountain. What tales have never been heard?

name: DunDun VR
description: DunDun VR is a short, surreal, humorous seated or standing experience in VR. It’s a linear single-player first-person adventure with a serene and atmospheric soundtrack. By the way, don’t forget to collect the eggs!

name: Wild Jigsaw VR
description: Wild Jigsaw VR is a relaxing casual game. Rebuild the world, see animals in their natural scale. Discover new realms and their secrets. See how animals look and behave. Imbibe yourself in nature.

name: Fruit Ninja VR 2
description: The sequel to the juiciest VR game of all time! Expand your arsenal with the bow, slice your way through unique challenges and explore the scenic Fruit Ninja temple grounds.

name: Maze: A VR Adventure
description: Maze: A VR Adventure is a roguelite horror game. Lose yourself into the darkness of a procedurally generated maze. Rely on your sense of direction and your magical skills to get out alive. Two types of locomotion systems available to meet the player's needs. HTC Vive or Oculus Rift are required.

name: Fun Christmas Santa VR
description: You have been chosen by Santa to assist him for this Christmas ! You'll have plenty things to take care of, like making toys, playing snowball, but also solve a big problem that arrived in the north pole that could compromise this Christmas !

name: RollerCoaster VR Universe
description: Virtual Reality Roller Coasters: Visit dinosaurs forest, medieval castle, space, underwater, horror, micro-world and city environment.

name: Pipe Dreamin' VR: The Big Easy
description: Pipe Dreamin' VR: The Big Easy is a single player casual puzzle game set in the chaotic, watery and silly world of subterranean New Orleans. As a player, you will use custom VR mechanics to catch raining pipes, avoid the rising waters and build unique pipe structures to escape flooding rooms.

name: Monolith VR
description: Try and look for a mysterious metal monolith that's full of riddles.

name: Stoirs VR
description: You find yourself closed in the multi-storeyed bunker with a mysterious artefact, a monster and the anomalities. If you want to survive, you must find a way to leave it.

name: Jury Trial
description: In this law simulation RPG you join a group of innocence lawyers. Set in a fictional country deeply divided by racial profiling, prejudice and social injustice it’s your job to find a jury who’s willing to listen. Study case material, discover new evidence and convince the jury in the court of law.

name: Space Battle
description: It's a frenetic space action game. You must survive the enemies and the dangerous environment. Prepare your arsenal before battle and try to eliminate as many enemies as you can before they do. Trade, explore and survive this challenge!

name: Halloween Escape
description: Halloween Escape is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while dodging pumpkins, flying skulls, and jellyfish. Use A or Left Arrow and D or Right Arrow to dodge obstacles and keep your lives for as long as possible.

name: WoodHeart
description: Explore a vast world in this 2D top-down Zelda-like adventure. Find treasures as you slash enemies, swing them around, and throw them at the bosses. Talk and laugh with people, animals, and even tree stumps. With no destined fate, will you slay the evil demon Firerom or just jump in puddles?

name: Princess in Airiness
description: To pray for peace, the princess once again flies to the top of the holy tower! The controls are simple. Just dragging and dropping with the mouse. The farther you drag, the higher the strength. Then just drop her and watch her go! Guide the princess on her way up the tower!

name: Azure Domain
description: Azure Domain is an aerial dogfighting game with a huge world, intense action, and a deeply rich story. Between ancient goddesses, extradimensional beings, maniacal dictators and corrupt leaders, it's hard to simply be a fighter pilot.

name: Pixel Ninja
description: This is an exciting ninjya action game with a 16-bit taste!

name: Evdeki Lanet
description: Evdeki Lanet is a first-person psychological horror game. It can impress you with a realistic and spooky home environment. Can you lift the curse?

name: Hentai! Zombie! Defense!
description: Collect sexy pictures of busty hentai babes in this score-attack zombie defense game where the more you slay, the more you see!

name: Chess Knights: Eldritch Hunter
description: Choose your hero and enter the dungeon in this otherworldly puzzle game.

name: Super Vili
description: Help minister of health destroy deadly virus!

name: Lucky Joe
description: “ Do You Like Dying ?” Lucky Joe is a unique action game that combines shooting and platforming in 60 large 2D levels. Core gameplay easy to learn but hard to master, intense gunfights, a touch of humor, tons of enemies, a bit of reflection, great sound tracks… Try, die and retry...

name: Serene
description: Serene is a simplistic, bright and challenging puzzle game with easy to understand movement focused around understanding and completing puzzles.

name: Destiny's Divide
description: Free PvP Fantasy Card Game that assigns real world value to in-game cards. But are you good enough to unlock them? Become a grand master of war strategy by dominating the ancient battles of Destiny's Divide. Conquer competitive game modes and receive one of a kind unique cards you can trade or sell.

name: Internet Cafe Simulator 2
description: Internet Cafe Simulator 2 is an extremely comprehensive and detailed internet cafe business simulation game.

name: Vapor Music Tour
description: This is a tour of Vapor Music’s West Post Production Studio Location in Toronto, Canada.

name: Woo Wop Da Bam
description: Woo Wop Da Bam is a battle royale game where the player uses flying cars that emit barriers to crash other players.

name: Taoyuan Adventure
description: A simple adventure games. Suitable for teenagers.

name: Sol 705
description: A hilarious point and click graphic adventure in the best spirit of the '90s where you play as a young man and his friends in a personal quest that will turn their passion for progressive rock and UFOs into a real intergalactic mess... If they manage to survive school !

name: Assembly Planter
description: A farming / automation game, that allows you to progress from a poor hard-working farmer with just a few old tools to a lazy rich guy that watches his machines do the work for him while he tries to optimize production.

name: 100 Hidden Cats 2
description: Hidden object game in the city setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: Unknown Region
description: You are one of the chosen survivors to set up your life in UNKNOWN REGION. Life has forever changed after an unknown virus has wiped out humanity. Navigate through the region to discover mutated humans and creatures. You will be challenged to test your survival skills. Throughout the region you will craft, build, fight, and scavenge for supplies and battle the elements every step of the way. Design and build base on your own or with your friends. You will need to be one hell of a fighter to survive this.

name: Gude! Jump n Run
description: Challenging 2D Platformer featuring a glowing Cat.

name: Quest: Escape Room
description: Imagine your dream date. That's what supposed to be with our hero, when he goes out with his beautiful girl. But his dream date suddenly becomes the survival game. Help him solve some riddles, pass difficult challenges, and escape the deadly laboratory.

name: Ero Shooter
description: +18 top-down space shoot 'em up. As the new commander of Eros your duty is to destroy all your enemies unit and to keep your crew satisfied.

name: Merchants of the Caribbean
description: Head to the Caribbean in search of lost treasure! Build factories, produce resources, manage the economy, win sea battles and save the islanders from witchcraft.

name: Shark Attack
description: One of the Most addictive Shark Game Play as a shark and you must do what you love! Swim around the ocean and fill your appetite by killing everything you can find.

name: Fabulous Place
description: Fabulous Place is an adventure game with tactical card battles set in a fairy world. Epic battles with fairy-tale heroes await you, which you can defeat with the help of your ingenuity. Win battles and strip characters of clothing

name: Oscuria: The World of Nightmares
description: There is another world, darker, more frightening. A world that is about to be completely invaded by nightmares. Zeyk and his friends find themselves by chance in this parallel reality in which they will have to face their greatest fears to prevent the unchallenged domination of nightmares.

name: 破镜恐惧
description: In this game, you will play a policeman who is transferred to Nabos from out of town. The crime rate here remains high all the year round, and ancient gangs and cults are entrenched here. you will be close to the city's innermost and darkest secret. What choice should you make then?

name: Pakucchauzo!
description: Sin descripción

name: Velocity VR Battle Royal
description: Spawn into my simulation, fight for your life until one remains. Destroy everything in your path, slice all in your way, climb into action, and punch out the competition.

name: Brave Hero
description: BRAVE HERO is a platformer where the player faces a seemingly simple task to collect all the shards of the crystal.

name: Dance Waifu
description: It's getting hot in here…

name: Humans V Zombies
description: Play Humans Versus Zombies, a new kind of battle royal FPS. There are three distinct game modes, survival mode, get to the objective, last man standing.

name: Footballer
description: Plunge into the wonderful world of football together with millions of players from all over the world. Create and upgrade your character. Play online with friends in 1vs1, 2vs2, 3vs3, 4vs4 matches where every player is a real player. Find your comrades in our discord server and see you on the field!

name: Let's Hobbee
description: Imagine beautiful place full coloured flowers and busy bees and You - the Master of Beekeepers - ruling this small universe. Build hives, collect resources, learn how to be better, develop the business, win the price!

name: Sheep Island
description: You've get a no people island. Then there is only one thing to do. Use your hands to increase the number of sheep.

name: StreamSavers
description: Introducing the first stages of StreamSavers! An idle-clicker game with heavy gacha/collecting and leveling mechanics that sits in your YouTube or Twitch streams! Viewers can interact with Twitch commands and donations. What will hatch on YOUR stream?

name: Funbag Fantasy 3if
description: The pallid bust of Pallas beckons! Arise O Julinas from the hoary Underworld; bestride these Empyrean mountains like a Titan. Myriad mammaries await thee. Only by thine providence shall Rome be saved and led into the grace of Funbags!

name: Dahlia no Wakudeki: Danchi-zuma Akiko ga Ochiru Jijou
description: Sin descripción

name: Captain Frogger
description: One day when a Gorilla was taking a walk, a family of Frogs jumped toward the Gorilla. The Frogs just wanted to hug their good friend Gorilla, but the surprised Gorilla tried to repel the Frogs. The Gorilla and the Frogs are best friends, though!

name: Sicko Island
description: Sicko Island is a survival, horror game where you'll need to find essential items, solve puzzles and fight your way to the General to put an end to the nightmare.

name: TUS
description: TUS is a fun, fast-paced shooter for you and your friends to play!

name: Hide and Shoot
description:
Dead or Discover! Try to win undetected by the enemy! Real turn-based strategy.

An online turn-based strategy game played on a tiled hex map. Put together a unit consisting of 4 characters to defeat opponents.
The biggest feature is that even if you're on the same tile as an opponent, you may not be able to detect them.
The key to victory is finding the opponent without being found.

name: Explory Story
description: Play as a world famous detective who is stuck inside one of his own works! Be careful and watch your step. The words on the page can come to life.

name: Write 'n' Fight
description: The greatest writers of all time are fighting each other in the arenas that were inspired by their work. Each character can summon his own "magic" arena where he becomes the boss of the level for a short ammount of time.

name: Monster Girl Breeder
description: Our protagonist is settling in for a gaming session with the latest erotic fantasy game, when they are suddenly whisked away to a fantasy world! Waking up in front of a horde of horny monster girls, its up to you to repopulate their isolated village!

name: Temporary Girl
description: A girl wants you to buy her food, wash her hair and buy her new clothes when you think of her. No matter where you are, We hope to give you a girl like this to make you happy! So, the pet girl was born here. She is sunny. And a little bit of a character.

name: Necrojacks
description: Summon undead to keep the graveyard calm and your business afloat

name: Space Squadron
description: Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies.

name: Puzzledorf
description: An elegant, block-pushing puzzle game with clean design, exploring the question, "What makes a good puzzle?" Set across multiple, beautiful worlds.

name: Crystal Rider
description: Crystal Rider is a 2d platformer with elements of a system of traps and exercises for each level, at each level there are more traps and dangers, difficulty on the level and a variety of obstacles.

name: Diego: Mission Red Tomato
description: Diego: Mission Red Tomatoes is a humorous game where you have to shoot the tomatoes.

name: An Absolutely Not Suspicious Cabin in the Woods
description: In a cabin in the woods, his girlfriend is possessed by The Book of the Dead (or "Necronomicon") that summons monsters in the mist that come in increasingly creepy waves. Will you be able to survive this retro battle against evil that mixes top-down action-rpg with arcade?

name: Box the Beat VR
description: Customize almost everything what can be customized in a rhythmic music game! In each location are unique visualizations to the beat of the music! You can also join the chill area. Sit down, move around the different locations and chill to your music!

name: Building 847
description: A horrifying short-story set in an alternate-reality 1986, about the end of the world. Where will we go, if our will is not our own?

name: Batsu!
description: Compete in hilarious improv challenges! Draw Suggestion Cards from the audience. The player that performs the worst gets punished... Japanese game show style!

name: Space Plane
description: Short, turn based puzzle game drawn and coded by Artur Petrov. His second project after the Ink Plane.

name: Rings of Hell
description: Rival professional wrestlers Red and Blue die in the ring and reawaken in Wrestle Hell, a pro-wrestling themed purgatory run by the devil herself: Wrestle Satan. The duo must prove their ability to work together in Active-Time-Battle matches on their quest to become champions of the Rings of Hell.

name: Shattered Slime
description: A cartoony and colorful 2.5D platformer.

name: OMG: One Million Guns
description: OMG: One Million Guns is a fast-paced, 2D, top-down, twin-stick shooter set in space, with LOTS of guns. Blast your way through waves of enemies with a multitude of weapons at your disposal. Full controller support included.

name: Visiting a Celebrity
description: Imagine yourself as a journalist traveling the homes of the world's most popular people. Get passports to fly from country to country. Earn gold to buy everything you need.

name: Toothy History
description: Toothy History - is a 2D hardcore platformer with surviving elements where you have to do various levels and collecting things playing as a cute dinosaur.

name: Trail of the Damned
description: Choose your own nightmare as you explore the stark world of Damnation. Struggle to survive against unnerving creatures, vicious bandits, and punishing elements! Can you endure the trail, uncover the secrets, and unlock Salvation? Many try - most just die.

name: Marble Maid
description: Marble Maid rolls in with lewd and wholesome gameplay! Cleaning mansions in a giant puzzle ball to reveal the sexy secrets behind the dust bunnies!

name: Bike Baron 2
description: Bike Baron 2 is a wild motorbike racer packed with monster jumps and explosive hazards. It mixes platforming and puzzle elements with over-the-top physics and pixel-perfect controls. There's no better way to unleash your inner daredevil than to crash your bike from the safety of your room.

name: Fort Craft
description: Fort Craft is a unique chance to become a imperial age royal craftsman. Build your own Fort and re-arrange them, at your own directions. Craft, rebuild and be prepared to manage forts !

name: Rocket Cave Adventure
description: Rocket Cave Adventure is a physics-based roguelike where you control your craft through procedurally generated caves. How deep can you make it? Better yet, how good are your flying skills?

name: Killing a Superstar
description: Killing a Superstar brings a new VR interactive experience with immersive sense of drama. The story will start in different spaces at the same time. Viewers can use the map function in the film to freely switch among different scenes. The viewers need to answer the key questions to solve crimes.

name: Allied Ambush
description: Defend your city from the onslaught of the dark army. A game of skill and strategy. Deploy machine gunners, snipers and towers. move your men into towers to increase their shooting range. Three challenging levels to conquer.

name: Alzheimer's: Memories
description: Alzheimer’s: Memories is a point-and-click adventure that tells the story of an old man diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease. In the game, you will re-experience moments of the life of the old man, and help him find out about his own past.

name: 问道仙途
description: Sin descripción

name: Alexey's Winter: Night Adventure
description: A classic Point-and-Click adventure game: the action takes place on a winter night in Ukraine in the nineties. You play as a young man who is faced with an unexpected series of events. Interact with characters. Explore a pencil-drawn world filled with light humor and a drop of sadness.

name: Text: Russia
description: Want to learn how to type on the keyboard at the speed of light? Then this simulator is for you! Choose 1 of 9 game types and train your typing skills!

name: End War RTS 2
description: A 3D modern real-time war game, realistic 3D style, the classic RTs of the second-generation continuation of End War RTS, stimulates the fast-paced sense of attack

name: Hive Slayer
description: Hive Slayer blends classic arcade style with the power of VR to make you the galaxy's deadliest defender. Face the alien XenoHorde and halt its invasion of the stars as you Blast All Bugs.

name: The Legend of Cesar
description: A super fun game made by just one person, your goal is to kill as many zombies as you can and try to survive in the forest that surrounds you.

name: Daisy Flies to the Moon
description: A sci-fi RPG that takes you to the Moon and beyond!

name: 7 Girls War
description: A legend passed down for generations says when the world is in peril, seven legendary heroes will come together to face evil and save the world.

name: Inbox Unbox
description: A worryingly recursive puzzle game about pushing boxes into other boxes. Rearrange the structure of the world itself to forge a path to the exit!

name: Chasing Tail
description: A peaceful fantasy of creatures big and small in all shapes and sizes. But a quiet danger threatens the tranquility of life, and could potentially throw the balance into chaos. Who will stick by your side? What bonds will hold true to the end? Will love help you prevail or will hate end us all?

name: endlessCorona
description: The prophecies of Nostradamus, the 2000 effect, the Maya? They predicted the end of the world and “nothing” happened and now, without anyone predicting it, the end of the world has come! Do we make a record? let's see who can last longer without getting infected ... Join the world competition!

name: Raidfield 2
description: Get in your boots and out in the battlefield. It's 1944 and the heat of the war is more than ever. In this cross-platform WW-2 shooter you take control of axis or ally units in a fast paced combat. You can also play with your friends on foot, tanks or even planes.

name: Totally Reliable Adventure Party
description: Action RPG meets a totally reliable ragdoll physics sandbox. Gather your clumsiest friends and embark on the most inefficient quest in the history of dark fantasy. Spooky dungeons, shiny loot and giant bosses await!

name: Recontact London: Cyber Puzzle
description: Full Motion Video Based Detective Puzzle

name: Popop!
description: Pop all the bubbles in the most satisfying game you'll ever play! Can you pop 'em all?

name: Analog Party Sim
description: A Pixel Art, 2D Casual Arcade game that takes you back to a time before video chat parties when getting drunk with friends was less Digital and more Analog.

name: Twin Balls
description: Twin Balls is an arcade scoring game.

name: Super CosmoJet
description: Super CosmoJet is a 2D physics-based action space game. Pilot your ship through 8 procedurally generated star systems on your career as a commercial space captain. Transport passengers, deliver cargo with your tractor beam, mine asteroids for gold or destroy enemies for bounty payments!

name: Bird's Eye
description: Bird's Eye is a relaxing card game about building balanced ecosystems.

name: MaJiang
description: Sichuan Mahjong, also known as Chengdu Mahjong, or Bloody Mahjong, is popular in Sichuan, Chongqing, and Guizhou, and is a form of entertainment. The core is to hit the door, wind and rain, count, fight to the end, check the bargaining, check the pig.

name: Virus ON
description: Virus ON - is a colourful 2D platformer with the simplest gameplay where you have to do various levels playing as a monster saving the world by eating tasty molecules.

name: Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness
description: 《Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness》is a card-based puzzle game with RPG components. Your job is to lead different girls to advance their adventure levels in a Virtual Reality Game.

name: VR Rescue of Girls
description: This is a VR horror game with the theme of secret room adventure. Players can wear a helmet to enter the underground secret room and experience the thrilling game of escape from the secret room.

name: Vacuum Pilot
description: Vacuum Pilot is a 2D speedrunning game with simple but hard to master controls based on mouse movement.

name: TeamTower
description: As a prophet of the Secret Church, you will lead a team of characters with unique characteristics. Gain loot through events and battles, use them to enhance the team, and finally complete the great sacrifice.

name: Missile Tank
description: We will destroy the boxes that appear randomly around you with a rocket that we will fire in the direction of the arrow on our tank.

name: Survivor Dieland
description: You're gonna get yourself killed being out here all by your lonesome... There's monsters on this island! Besides, It's not always the beasts you should be afraid of... Beasts are easy to predict. They just want to kill and eat you. Humans are much harder... They'll pretend to be your friend first...

name: Vacation: DayOff
description: The Destiny of 6-people in the island

name: District 99
description: Unidentified objects began to fall to the ground, from which aggressive monsters emerged. Your task is to clear one of these areas from enemies.

name: Freelancer Life Simulator
description: Become one of the best freelancers, starting your way from scratch. Fulfill orders of varying difficulty.

name: Low-Key: A Dope Game
description: Action Adventure. RPG. Strong Language. Adult Content.

name: Alan's Automaton Workshop
description: Alan's Automaton Workshop is an open-ended programming puzzle game. Start a new business with Alan Turing and his groundbreaking innovation: the Turing Machine. Build unique automatons, and solve all kinds of problems from clients.

name: Pasta Master
description: Pasta Master is an adventure 2D platformer set in a world where pasta based food is the most popular type of dish. The game follows Jimmy, a man who gets his pasta stolen by a mysterious figure and sets of on an adventure to get it back…

name: Dash Dash Delivery
description: Welcome to Dash Dash Delivery, a simulation where you play as a delivery person in a nearby mall. Have fun delivering items, exploring, purchasing items, customizing your character, enjoying delicious mall food items, as well as the upbeat atmosphere. Can you find all the easter eggs?

name: The logic inside
description: Purpose of the game: You need to draw a line on the screen from point A to point B. The game has 13 levels. The difficulty increases with each level. There are teleports, enemies.

name: The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku
description: Follow the story of Amimi Imai, an 18 year old student who's recent move from home has left her succumbed to a new high school and new life. The Sound of Fireworks: The Haiku is a single path/ending visual novel about love, acceptance, and a good ol' awkward budding teenage friendship.

name: Dying: 1983
description: Dying 1983 is the new adventure from the Dying franchise. In this first person puzzle game you will operate the protagonist to freely explore the 3D scenes, using a variety of props collected to solve one puzzle after another, ultimately discovering the hidden truth behind the scenes.

name: Keezeh: The Spector of Time
description: Fight your way through waves of hostile tribal warriors, dangerous creatures and explore uncharted islands while trying to reach your spaceship in this indie adventure / RPG game.

name: Woody Chopper
description: In Woody Chopper you help Woody chop down the endless tree on his way to becoming a lumberjack millionaire. Whether in spring, summer, autumn or winter, it's the perfect casual game for in-between. Now with Achievements! Play Woody Chopper today and help Woody get the legendary axe.

name: Architectus
description: ARCHiTECTUS is a sandbox game about planning, building, furnishing and exploring of constructions.

name: Neo-Zero
description: The role-playing game set in a 1990s computer simulation.

name: Hidden Forest
description: It's a first-person shooter that allows you to explore islands，The player can kill enemies, dodge their attacks, and pick up their weapons after killing them.

name: Lab Escape
description: In Lab Escape, you can defeat robots and bosses while using a jet pack, a Exploding disc launcher, a blaster, and a shotgun!

name: My Lust Wish
description: My Lust Wish is an Adult LifeSim RPG Sandbox. The game tells about a young girl Ashley, who came to a small sweet town to study at university. Ashley will have to survive in this city on her own, earn money, buy food and things, study at the university and etc.

name: Galactory
description: Sin descripción

name: Hack 3
description: Hack 3 is a ROM hack of the 1990 Nintendo game Super Mario World. It plays similarly to a typical Mario platformer, except that every level has a unique obstacle to overcome, which is explained to the player as they start.

name: Super Mario 4
description: Super Mario 4 is a hack of the Game Boy game Crayon Shin Chan 4, originally by Bandai. It is a very common title on multicarts.

name: Last Shot
description: A Sci-Fi Variety Online Multiplayer First Person Shooter presented to you as a Galactic Combat Gameshow. Hosted by Specter-473 from Zeta-Reticuli and Skashkar the Conqueror of Worlds as they bring you the engaging play-by-play commentary!

name: Child of Light: Dark Aurora Pack
description: Child of Light: Dark Aurora, a DLC pack for Child of Light, contains an exclusive skin for Aurora and provides her improvements of Magic Power, Defense and Magic resistance. Also included in the bonus content a pack of Rough oculi: 3 Blue, 3 Green and 2 Red.

name: Sleep
description: The main character (Jill) is often tormented by nightmares. Her friends asked her to look after their house while they were away. That's when her real nightmare begins. You will have to feel the history of her nightmares and understand what is really behind it.

name: Worlds of Magic: Titans
description: Let loose the Titans, the most powerful creatures in the Worlds of Magic and try to defeat them or coerce to join your empire!

name: Sinister Halloween: Asylum
description: As a journalist, you receive a secret email from Mountain Peaks Asylum in Sinister Halloween: Asylum, a DLC for Sinister Halloween. A little girl is reported lost trick or treating nearby and as a reporter, you investigate the area on Halloween Night.

name: Hare In The Hat: The Abyss
description: Hare In The Hat: The Abyss, a DLC for Hare In The Hat, is a fancy point & click cartoon adventure game with puzzles and mini-games of varying difficulty. It takes place in sea abyss, filled with puzzles, riddles, clues and hidden objects. Don't let the Hare disappear in the abyss!

name: Tiger Tank
description: It's a tank battle game from a top view.Players will drive various types of tanks in World War II, galloping across the battlefield.

name: Something in the Water
description: Somtheing in the Water is a retro survival horror first person shooter built for the E1M1 Magazine game jam. It can be finished in one sitting and takes roughly 15 minutes to complete. However, save games are available for those that want or need them.

name: Dinopatch
description: Dinopatch is a ROM hack/mod of Dinosaur Planet which intends on fixing the issues on the prototype version of the game that leaked onto the internet (such as event triggering, bugs, glitches, crashes), making it as playable as it can be.

name: Dinomod
description: Dinomod is a ROM hack/mod of Dinosaur Planet which has the same purpose of fixing the issues on the prototype version of the game that leaked onto the internet, and also adds debugging tool options to the code.

name: Doom 2 Reloaded
description:
Doom 2 Reloaded (D2RELOAD.WAD) is a 2009 megawad designed by Andy Stewart (eschdoom). Most of the 32 levels contained are vanilla-compatible, but errors could appear at a few points while using the original executable, so it is better to play through a limit removing source port; another reason is that additional graphics are present. Almost all of the maps could be played in deathmatch or cooperative mode.

A DeHackEd patch is used to change the levels' names and par times. This WAD is widely known not only by the means of detail and texture alignment or frequent use of non-standard graphics, but also by enhancing gameplay on some of the levels, most notably on the super secret level, which contains 32 secrets that should be accessed one by one using various techniques including rocket jumping, waiting for a monster to open a locked door from behind or just by careful observation of the level's objects.

name: Planet Coaster: Magnificent Rides Collection
description: Amaze and delight your guests with brand new rides and coasters for your Theme Park! The Magnificent Rides Collection adds nine brand new rides and coasters, and one additional variant.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Halena & Cook Character Pack
description: This extra character pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters - Cook and Halena, as well as character and announcer voices for them!

name: Crossout: Horsemen of Apocalypse - War
description: This pack includes: unique armoured vehicle “War machine”; Weapon: epic crossbow “Phoenix”, rare course rocket “AT Wasp”, 2 pcs.; unique epic cabin “Echo”; “Twin wheels”, 6 pcs.; Engine “Hot red” of epic rarity; Structural parts of “War”; Unique character portrait “Victor Pyrrhus”; Rare decor “Furnace”, 2 pcs.; Exclusive sticker “Red horse”; Spray can with unique paint “Scorching sand”; Increases the maximum number of parts used to 55; 1500 in-game coins.

name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight
description: CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight is a DLC for the simulator game CarX Drift Racing Online, featuring virtual drift racing on mountain roads and narrow city streets. It's quite challenging for both rookie and experienced racers. Front lights cutting through darkness are your only companion on mountain roads and narrow city streets. Discover drifting again and enjoy new atmospheres for your favorite locations at night with CarX Drift Racing Online: Midnight.

name: Achilles: Legends Untold
description: Achilles: Legends Untold is an isometric action RPG that draws inspiration from soulslike and hack & slash genres. However, compared to them, the title by Polish studio Dark Point Games has a much lower level of entry. The creators wanted to make a game that would be more accessible to beginners, who are just starting their adventure with this type of gameplay. It doesn’t mean, however, that Achilles: Legends Untold is a title aimed only at newcomers, because it is filled with optional challenging missions, which will certainly also satisfy experienced players.

name: Beat 'Em Up
description: The Beat 'Em Up game is a complete package of boxing and karate. The whole game is designed in a story mode that you will Have to fight against the gangsters of city by applying your boxing kung Fu skills. This kung Fu game is advanced type of fighting games. Beat 'Em Up is in wait for you.

name: Neon Knight
description: Old-school FPS in a neon package with lasers and robots! Fast paced action, bunny hopping and rocket jumping.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Iru & Mira Character Pack
description: This extra character pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters - the gun expert Iru and the ninja-esque Mira. The new characters come fully voiced!

name: Clicker Planet: Bluestone Project
description: Did you want to degrade to a time when planets and their raw materials, new tools to buy? Prove yourself in the Clicker's Planet. Mine raw materials and to buy you new tools. Start a career as a mining head to various planet, and pits you rich and upgrade your company. Collect more crystals and buy more and more new tools.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Talay Mining Complex Mission Pack
description: Among the sparkling gemstones of Talay, a set of long-buried Eternia Crystals have been unearthed. But the volcanic activity of the mine is rapidly rising and its imminent eruption threatens to destroy both friend and foe. Protect the Eternia Crystals from the horde as you contend with the dangers of the mine itself!

name: Ride 3: Naked Bikes Pack
description: Ride 3: Naked Bikes Pack expands your garage with new content. This package contains 5 exclusive bikes and a new Volume with 10 additional events.

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball - Solo
description: Make the Kessel Run in less than 12 parsecs with three exciting Star Wars Pinball tables: Relive your favorite film moments in Solo, deploy Imperial might to win the Battle of Mimban, and live a lovable scoundrel's life in Calrissian Chronicles.

name: Maison Ikkoku: Omoide no Photograph
description: Maison Ikkoku: Omoide no Photograph is a Japanese menu-based graphical adventure game based on the anime and manga series. Players control Yusaku Godai and will need to help him find a secret photograph that's been hidden away by the manager. Godai will need to bribe the inhabitants, which constantly move around the house in order to get access to Kyoko's room. But even if Godai makes it into the manager's room and tries to look at the framed photo, something will always happen which will force Godai to leave the room. The game has the player move between locations in the boarding house and the town, constantly running out of money, and meeting all the cast from the original comic book, including Nikaido who did not appear in the anime.

name: Death Box
description: Death Box is a labyrinth horror game where the goal is to escape the death box and manage to survive. You have to find the exit of a huge maze of secret rooms and doors without getting caught by zombies and traps. There are 2 types of enemies: fast and slow zombies.

name: Maze Escape
description: This game is to escape the maze while avoiding zombies and obstacles. Use the item and remember the way you came to escape from the maze. Good luck.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Black Hill Fortress MP017
description: Tiger Tank 59 is a top-down shooting game. Players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, and defeat all the enemy tanks.

name: Super Donkey Kong 2
description: ‎Super Donkey Kong 2 is a pirated Famicom port of the SNES game Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest published by NT in 1997. It greatly resembles Super Donkey Kong.

name: Sub Commander
description: Sub Commander is a free, independently developed roguelike submarine simulator with an emphasis on realism and freedom of choice. Originally, the game was envisioned to be a kind of cross between Dwarf Fortress and the film K-19 The Widowmaker but it is rapidly growing to a full featured submarine warfare simulator. Eventually I plan to simulate all aspects of cold war era naval and aerial combat, so the player's submarine will be in the midst of a dynamic, procedurally generated global war.
